text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the State Board of Nursing.

"License" means, unless the context requires otherwise, a license issued by the Board to practice:
Registered nursing; or
Licensed practical nursing.
"Licensed practical nurse" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to practice licensed practical nursing.

"Nurse practitioner" means an individual who:
Is licensed by the Board to practice registered nursing; and
Is certified by the Board to practice as a nurse practitioner.

section.section:
"Practice registered nursing" means the performance of acts requiring substantial specialized knowledge, judgment, and skill based on the biological, physiological, behavioral, or sociological sciences as the basis for assessment, nursing diagnosis, planning, implementation, and evaluation of the practice of nursing in order to:
Maintain health;
Prevent illness; or
Care for or rehabilitate the ill, injured, or infirm.

text.section: "Registered nurse" means, unless the context requires otherwise, an individual who is licensed by the Board to practice registered nursing.
